docs.snippet: Foreign exchanges moved more erratically last week than at any time since last fall when devaluation of British sterling, joined by all of the major currencies of the world, touched off a long period of irregularity.

docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, Oct. 9--Declaring that the United States proposal may be "the last chance" for the United Nations, John Foster Dulles today urged the Political and Security Committee of the General Assembly to strengthen the Assembly's powers to take...
docs.lead_paragraph: LAKE SUCCESS, Oct. 9--Declaring that the United States proposal may be "the last chance" for the United Nations, John Foster Dulles today urged the Political and Security Committee of the General Assembly to strengthen the Assembly's powers to take action against an aggressor if the Soviet veto should prevent the Security Council from doing so.
docs.abstract: Assembly com studies program; Dulles urges adoption; sees program 'last chance' for UN; urges USSR back it; Vishinsky says he agrees on some points; Min Younger (GB), M Schumann (France), Brig Gen Romulo (Philippines) and 4 other nations reprs back program

headline.main: SEES 'LAST CHANCE'; Delegate Presses Plan to Strengthen Assembly Against Aggression SOVIET FAVORS PART OF IT Surprise Move by Vishinsky to Cut Off General Debate Is Defeated, 48 Votes to 5
